education.speciality: Telematics, focus in security and network design
education.summary: 3 years of full time school and one year of internship between second and third year
education.details: The tudy covers a various of different areas such as software development, software engineering, operating systems basics, telematics, computer network, web technologies, project management, natural science, mathematics, economics, IT-law, communication and languages.
education.thesis: Diploma thesis 'What is IAC', see http://diploma.example.com (German only)

education.summary: Apprenticeship (VET) as an electronic technician in an armament factory of the Swiss Army.
education.details: This is one of programs for one of the 230 different professions. In Switzerland, many professional qualifications are obtained in upper-secondary education, while in other countries the same qualifications are obtained in tertiary level education.
